name: Threat Research & History Trail
description: THRT is a blockchain-powered platform whose goal is to decentralize file classification for “safe”, “malicious”, or “unknown" results and encrypted AI/ML training datasets. Built on the Solana blockchain, THRT leverages public transparency, data immutability, and tokengated access leading to the empowerment of students, researchers, and cybersecurity professionals by providing tools for education, audit, and threat research.
